text: 'awalam yasir hwla' almukadhibun brsaltk -ayha alrswl- fi alard, fayanzuruu kayf kan khatimat al'umam alssabiqat qblhm? kanuu 'ashada minhum btshana, wa'abqaa fi al'ard atharana, falam tanfaeuhum shdt qwahm weizam ajsamhm, fa'akhadhahum allah beqwbth; bsbb kufruhum waktsabhm alatham, wama kan lahum min eadhab allah min waq yqyhm mnh, fydfeh enhm
